### Alloca {#a30c6600d963aece0e077181d01716ecd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const AllocaInst&#42; llvm::MachineFrameInfo::StackObject::Alloca</>}>
If this stack object is originated from an Alloca instruction this value saves the original IR allocation.

Can be NULL.

### isStatepointSpillSlot {#a738e8c106d5d05da4385d2fa1008fb55}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MachineFrameInfo::StackObject::isStatepointSpillSlot = false">
If true, this stack slot is used to spill a value (could be deopt and/or GC related) over a statepoint.

We know that the address of the slot can&#39;t alias any LLVM IR value. This is very similar to a Spill Slot, but is created by statepoint lowering is <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a>, not the register allocator.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h/#l00149">149</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h">MachineFrameInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isZExt {#a61c4f66219ae14b9d1bab1595d92b76f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MachineFrameInfo::StackObject::isZExt = false">
If true, the object has been zero-extended.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h/#l00177">177</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h">MachineFrameInfo.h</a>.

### StackID {#a62c626ab1278cef36c4960ed40912748}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::MachineFrameInfo::StackObject::StackID</>}>
Identifier for stack memory type analagous to address space.

If this is non-0, the meaning is target defined. Offsets cannot be directly compared between objects with different stack IDs. The object may not necessarily reside in the same contiguous memory block as other stack objects. Objects with differing stack IDs should not be merged or replaced substituted for each other. It is assumed a target uses consecutive, increasing stack IDs starting from 1.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineframeinfo-h">MachineFrameInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
